description:
Put some energy in under your kick. This rigid and stable ski will put some pop in your stride without sacrificing control. With a low density core, this ski satisfies fitness-oriented skiers with their efficiency and low weight. Its slick base is durable and waxable, so you can power off on night skis, training days and more. If fitness is your jam, then these are you skis.

  • Active cap construction flexes from tip to tail and offers good torsional rigidity
  • Extended edge offers good control and glide
  • Premium low density core for light race-like performance
  • Sure Kick Concept for responsive kick and energy return
  • K7000 graphite base glides on variable snow conditions
name: Rossignol Delta Sport Classic Skis - Men's
